sentences.english: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture-controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.chinese: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿，热液充填型矿床。

sentences.english: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture-controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.chinese: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿，热液充填型矿床。

sentences.english: The origin type of ore deposit is a subvolcanic hydrothermal gold - bearing , altered rock type.
sentences.chinese: 矿床成因类型为次火山热液含金蚀变岩型。

sentences.english: The distribution of the gold deposits clings to deep big faults.
sentences.chinese: 金矿床分布与深大断裂存在依附性。

sentences.english: The authors suggest that the Chencai Group is one of the possible source bed for uranium deposits formed.
sentences.chinese: 作者认为，陈蔡群是形成铀矿床的可能铀源层之一。

sentences.english: In Yongping, the main type of ore deposit is skarn-type.
sentences.chinese: 在永平地区，矿床类型主要是矽卡岩型矿床。

sentences.english: In Yongping, the main type of ore deposit is skarn-type.
sentences.chinese: 在永平地区，矿床类型主要是矽卡岩型矿床。

sentences.english: The niobium-tantalum and rare-earths ore deposits in China and their occurred minerals are described.
sentences.chinese: 该文对我国铌钽稀土矿床及其产出的矿物进行了论述。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: Different type of silver deposits is under the control of different geotectonic environments.
sentences.chinese: 不同大地构造环境控制了不同类型的银矿床。

sentences.english: There are evaporite beds or evaporite minerals.
sentences.chinese: 矿床的含矿岩系大多含有蒸发岩。

sentences.english: The formation of scheelite deposit has an intimate relationship with amphibole-schist.
sentences.chinese: 白钨矿矿床的形成与角闪片岩关系密切。

sentences.english: The Pyrite is one of main typomorphic characteristic of W-Sb-Au deposits series of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是湘西钨锑金矿床系列的主要标型矿物之一。

sentences.english: The Lizigou gold deposit in Song Country, western Henan Province, China, belongs to the altered tectonic type ore golden deposit.
sentences.chinese: 豫西嵩县栗子沟金矿属于构造蚀变岩型金矿床。

sentences.english: The Yichun Luming molybdenum ore is a big porphyry deposits.
sentences.chinese: 伊春鹿鸣钼矿为大型斑岩型矿床。
